about.summary: Provides the class unions that must be preloaded in order for the basic tools in the OOMPA (Object-Oriented  Microarray and Proteomics Analysis) project to be defined and loaded. It also includes vectorized operations for row-by-row means, variances, and t-tests. Finally, it provides new color schemes. Details on the packages in the OOMPA project can be found at <http://oompa.r-forge.r-project.org/>.

Provides the class unions that must be preloaded in order for the basic tools in the OOMPA (Object-Oriented  Microarray and Proteomics Analysis) project to be defined and loaded. It also includes vectorized operations for row-by-row means, variances, and t-tests. Finally, it provides new color schemes. Details on the packages in the OOMPA project can be found at <http://oompa.r-forge.r-project.org/>.

name: r-oompabase
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "3.2.10" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-oompabase
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/oompaBase_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/oompaBase/oompaBase_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 255192acbef8937fd5116063396b463da34ef419a3736793c0bdf3eb4169d208

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/
  missing_dso_whitelist:
    - '*/R.dll'        # [win]
    - '*/Rblas.dll'    # [win]
    - '*/Rlapack.dll'  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base >=4.4
    - r-cluster
  run:
    - r-base >=4.4
    - r-cluster

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('oompaBase')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('oompaBase')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: http://oompa.r-forge.r-project.org/
  license: Apache-2.0
  summary: Provides the class unions that must be preloaded in order for the basic tools in the OOMPA (Object-Oriented  Microarray and Proteomics Analysis) project to be defined and loaded. It also includes vectorized operations for row-by-row means, variances, and t-tests. Finally, it provides new color schemes. Details
    on the packages in the OOMPA project can be found at <http://oompa.r-forge.r-project.org/>.
  license_family: APACHE
  license_file:
    - LICENSE-2.0.txt

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: oompaBase
# Version: 3.2.9
# Date: 2019-08-19
# Title: Class Unions, Matrix Operations, and Color Schemes for OOMPA
# Author: Kevin R. Coombes
# Maintainer: Kevin R. Coombes <krc@silicovore.com>
# Depends: R (>= 3.0)
# Imports: methods, graphics, grDevices, stats, cluster
# Description: Provides the class unions that must be preloaded in order for the basic tools in the OOMPA (Object-Oriented  Microarray and Proteomics Analysis) project to be defined and loaded. It also includes vectorized operations for row-by-row means, variances, and t-tests. Finally, it provides new color schemes. Details on the packages in the OOMPA project can be found at <http://oompa.r-forge.r-project.org/>.
# License: Apache License (== 2.0)
# LazyLoad: yes
# URL: http://oompa.r-forge.r-project.org/
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2019-08-24 09:52:53 UTC; Kevin Coombes
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2019-08-24 14:40:02 UTC
